parameters.content:
## Simple NPS Detractor Alert System

### This streamlined workflow provides real-time alerts for NPS detractors (scores 6 or below).
When Pendo sends an NPS submission via webhook, the workflow filters for detractors, calculates urgency levels, and immediately notifies the team through Slack and email. The alerts include customer information, their feedback, risk assessment, and quick action buttons. This simple version is perfect for teams that need immediate awareness of unhappy customers without complex integrations or AI analysis.
